title: If people cannot read what you say in chat
body:
When you warn them that there's an udyr going for your blue and you ask for assistance numerous times and they then get killed 20 seconds after you because you tried to fight the udyr by yourself and your teammates are too blind to read what you said and then wonder where the udyr came from that killed are just r%%%%%ed. 

Quit game 7 minutes in, asked enemy to report me and uninstalled. Do I care? Nope. I refuse to play with brainless idiots who can't read what I type or see my pings for assistance.
